content: *this is a summerly sister to my quiet folly 1 pattern * materials - **yarn** nurja merino sock 75% merino 25% nylon 420 m / 100 g size 1 color ruusuke non repeatable colorway 210 m size 2 color spinelli 240 m - **needles** 2 5 mm or to get gauge - **notions** yarn needle blocking materials gauge 36 sts and 48 row / 10 cm stockinette stitch blocked notes - both socks are worked mostly identically but in some places there are different instructions for right and left sock when there s only one instruction it applies to both socks there are also different instep charts for right and left sock - socks are intented to be very snug to prevent socks from rolling down 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/quiet-folly
